    • Method Detail

      • getLayoutDirection

        public static int getLayoutDirection(android.view.View $receiver)

        The resolved layout direction for this view.

        Returns:
        {@link #LAYOUT_DIRECTION_RTL} if the layout direction is RTL or returns {@link #LAYOUT_DIRECTION_LTR} if the layout direction is not RTL.

      • isRTL

      • showKeyboard

        public static void showKeyboard(android.view.View $receiver,
                                int flags)

        Tries to focus this view and show the soft input window for it.

        Parameters:
        flags - Provides additional operating flags to be used with InputMethodManager.showSoftInput(). Currently may be 0, SHOW_IMPLICIT or SHOW_FORCED.
